title: HTML spec change: escaping < and > in attributes

title: A new way to style gaps in CSS

title: Easy way to upload, transform and deliver files and images (Sponsored)
description: Managing media is a really difficult task if you try to do all of it yourself, especially if the media comes from other sources. The file can be submitted in any state and size, but what if you need something really specific? title: How to Download a YouTube Video or Channel
description: The ability to download media on the internet almost feels like a lost art. When I was in my teens, piracy of mp3s, movies, and just about everything else via torrents and apps like Kazaa, LimeWire, Napster, etc. was in full swing. These days sites use blob URLs and other means to prevent downloads. Luckily […] The post How to Download a YouTube Video or Channel appeared first on David Walsh Blog.
author: David Walsh

title: Color Everything in CSS
description: An introduction to "Color spaces", "Color models", "Color gamuts," and basically all of the "Color somethings" in CSS. Color Everything in CSS originally published on CSS-Tricks, which is part of the DigitalOcean family. You should get the newsletter.
author: Juan Diego Rodríguez

title: CSS Color Functions
description: CSS has a number of functions that can be used to set, translate, and manipulate colors. Learn what they are and how they are used with a bunch of examples to get you started. CSS Color Functions originally published on CSS-Tricks, which is part of the DigitalOcean family. You should get the newsletter.
author: Sunkanmi Fafowora
